post:
We are **YourLastHost**, the only web host that **guarantees to be the very last web host that you will ever need**. 

**A few key features:**

- 99.99% uptime guarantee
- 90 day money back guarantee. (one of the longest in the industry!)
- Proactive service status checking. (yes, really!)
- 24/7/365 Help & Support
- Over 2 years in business
- Great reviews & stellar reputation **[[check us out](https://webhostinggeeks.com/providers/yourlasthost)]**
- 24/7 Support Live Chat and HelpDesk Support

**Features of our VPS hosting:**

- Dual processors at 2.4+ GhZ
- RAID-10 Disks
- Instant Setup
- Plenty of OS choices (with custom OS supported, and purpose-built templates)
- 4 Great Locations -- Jacksonville, Los Angeles, Dallas and France!
- Free VPS migrations -- Switch between any of our great locations!
- Tons of IPv4 Addresses Available
- Snapshot backups
- Voxility 500GBPS DDoS Protection (Jacksonville only)

**OpenVZ VPS Offers:**

- 512MB RAM
- 512MB SWAP

- 1 x IPv4 Address
- 1TB Bandwidth
- 100Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink
- $18/yr

– 2x Intel Xeon E5-2660 CPU (16x 3 GHz)
– 64GB RAM
– 6 x 1TB HDDs

– 1Gbps Uplink
